#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,k,i,j;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>k;
        k--;
        long long int act=1,res=0;
        while(k)
        {
            res+=2*(k%5)*act;
            k/=5;
            act*=10;
        }
        cout<<res<<endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}
